Home Renovation Cost Calculator

Calculate accurate home renovation costs with our free online calculator. Get detailed estimates for materials, labor, and total project costs for any room renovation.

Estimated Renovation Cost

Total Estimated Cost:

* Estimates include a 10-20% buffer for unexpected expenses. Actual costs may vary.

How to Use

  1. 1. Select your room type and enter the square footage
  2. 2. Choose the renovation level that matches your project
  3. 3. Select your location for regional cost adjustments
  4. 4. Check any additional work required
  5. 5. Click "Calculate Cost" to get your estimate

Frequently Asked Questions

How accurate are the renovation cost estimates?

Our calculator provides estimates based on typical market rates and industry standards. Actual costs may vary depending on location, specific materials chosen, contractor rates, and project complexity. We recommend getting quotes from multiple contractors for accurate pricing.

What costs are included in the calculation?

The calculator includes materials, labor, permits (if applicable), and a buffer for unexpected expenses. It does not include furniture, appliances, or decorative items unless specifically selected.

Can I save or export my calculations?

Yes, you can print the results or copy them to your clipboard. We also provide a detailed breakdown that you can share with contractors or use for budgeting purposes.

How often are the cost estimates updated?

Our cost database is updated quarterly to reflect current market conditions and material price changes. Regional variations are factored into the calculations.
